about_the_game:
OVERVIEW: 

Enter Godforged: Origins of Ozgalor, a single-player Action RPG that blends deep storytelling with tactical action. Set in the vast world of Nelethar, forge your destiny in a saga filled with fellowship, treachery, and peril.

Assume the role of a young noble venturing into a world besieged by the Forgotten One. As Ozgalor teeters on the brink of darkness, it falls to you to resist the temptations of power and unite its people against a God.

VISUAL STYLE: 

Ozgalor is a carefully crafted archipelago, designed to showcase a vibrant, stylized environment that captures the grandeur of the vast world of Nelethar. It offers an experience rich in lore and filled with secrets yet to be uncovered.

MAIN FEATURES: 

  • A Semi-Open World: Explore the Ozgalor Archipelago, a vast land teeming with mythical creatures and dangers of every kind. Journey through varied zones, from lush forests to open seas and ancient ruins. Forge alliances, face formidable enemies, and venture into the dark places where the followers of the Forgotten One lurk.

  • The Class Blending system: Choose from six classes and explore their full potential, or if you prefer experimentation, use Class Blending to combine spells from different classes, creating a distinct sub-class tailored to your preferred playstyle.

  • Castle Building / Kingdom ruling: Your castle serves as the central hub and base of operations. Customize it, gather allies, and defend it against enemies. Your decisions as a ruler will influence your realm's growth and power across the Ozgalor Archipelago.

  • Masselite Corruption System: Draw upon the power of Masselite, an energy infused with the essence of a fallen god. As you channel its power to cleanse the land, your hero grows stronger—but at a steep cost. With each surge of power, the darkness within you deepens. Balance strength with the looming threat of wickedness, as every choice pulls you closer to the edge. Will you resist the corruption, or let the darkness consume you?

    ADDITIONAL FEATURES: 

  • Boss Fights: Engage in epic, large-scale battles against formidable foes, each requiring unique strategies and tactics to overcome.

  • Companions: Meet and form bonds with several characters, each possessing unique traits, goals, and perspectives on the world. Your choices will shape these relationships, influencing your journey as you collaborate toward common goals or find yourselves fighting against each other.

  • Crafting: Master a deep crafting system tailored to your chosen class, creating powerful weapons, armor, and items essential for survival.

  • Class Quests: Embark on class-specific quests that deepen your character’s lore, unlock new abilities, and shape your hero’s destiny.

  • World Events: Participate in dynamic world events that can alter the course of your journey, bringing new challenges and opportunities.

  • Looting & Items: Discover and collect a vast array of loot and items, each with unique attributes that enhance your character and strategy.

content_descriptors.notes: Godforged: Origins of Ozgalor contains strong language, violence, blood and gore, as well as sexual themes.

short_description: Godforged: Origins of Ozgalor is a story-rich, single-player Action RPG set in the world of Nelethar. Experience tactical combat, class blending, and kingdom ruling in a world besieged by a god, where your actions and choices shape the future of Ozgalor.
